author: Mustak Ali
title: kaziranga-shillong-cherrapunji trip
text: we are 9 friends, all fit and fine in our early 20s! planning to tour kaziranga-shillong-cherrapunji this december.Here is our tour itinerary- 23/12/15: boarding kanchanjangha from hwh 24/12/15:arrival @ghy...checkin @ any budget hotel in paltanbazar area...local sightseeing(kamakha,umanada,bo sistho)..nightstay in ghy 25/12/15:boarding train early morning for furkating...reaching furkating @12pm..avail local car to reach kaziranga..check in @kunjabon dorm..book elephant ride for next day..if possible jeep safari from 2pm..local sightseeing..nightstay 26/12/15:early morning elephant safari..leave for shillong...sightseeing on the way(umiyam lake?)..checkin @ any budget hotel in policebazar area..local sightseeing..nighstay 27/12/15:xploring shillong-shillong peak,elephant falls..visit mawlynnong..leave for cherrapunji..checkin @cherrapunji..overnight stay.. 28/12/2015:double root bridge trek..cherrapunji sightseeing..overnight stay 29/12/2015:back to guwahati..board train please suggest if this itinerary is ok..and plz help regarding the following queries! 1.info about cheap budget hotel in guwahati..we r 9..so 2 four bedded rooms would do i guess..any dorm available in paltanbazar??? 2.apart from the temples in guwahati any interesting sightseeing spot nearby??? 3.if we hire a sumo from ghy for kaziranga what will be the estimated charge for the one way trip??? 4.if we reach furkating by train from ghy and hire sumo from furkating to reach kaziranga..estimated fare and time to reach kaziranga from furkating??? 5.we are staying in kunjobon dorm..any review???any better place to check in(keep in mind we dont want any luxury and should be budget friendly)..contacts?? 6.will there be any problem in hiring cars for shillong from kaziranga???estimated charge for one way trip from kaziranga to shillong and time??? 7.good cheap hotels in shillong???any dorm???must visit spots??? 8.estimated fare if we hire car to visit mawlynnong and cherrapunji from shillong??? 9.any homestay in cherrapunji???dorm??? must visit spots??? any suggestions,advices,tips are welcome!!!
